entry.title: EXTREME COLD WARNING , Sanirajak
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 3:27 PM EST Friday 06 January 2023

entry.title: Current Conditions: Clear, -38.1°C
entry.summary:
Observed at: Sanirajak (Hall Beach Airport) 10:00 PM EST Friday 06 January 2023
Condition: Clear
Temperature: -38.1°C
Pressure: 102.3 kPa
Visibility: 16.1 km
Humidity: 66 %
Wind Chill: -52
Dewpoint: -42.1°C
Wind: NNW 17 km/h
Air Quality Health Index: N/A

entry.title: Friday night: A few clouds. Low minus 41.
entry.summary: A few clouds. Wind northwest 20 km/h becoming light after midnight. Low minus 41. Wind chill near minus 55. Hazardous frostbite conditions. Forecast issued 4:00 PM EST Friday 06 January 2023

entry.title: Saturday: Chance of flurries. High minus 36. POP 30%
entry.summary: Partly cloudy. 30 percent chance of flurries in the afternoon. Wind up to 15 km/h. High minus 36. Wind chill minus 55 in the morning and minus 49 in the afternoon. Hazardous frostbite conditions. Forecast issued 4:00 PM EST Friday 06 January 2023

entry.title: Saturday night: Chance of flurries. Temperature steady near minus 37. POP 30%
entry.summary: Mainly cloudy with 30 percent chance of flurries. Wind up to 15 km/h. Temperature steady near minus 37. Wind chill near minus 50. Frostbite in minutes. Forecast issued 4:00 PM EST Friday 06 January 2023
